page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content: Most of the people who go to church in West Linton are members of St. Andrews Presbyterian church. This church is very old. Mr Burt was appointed as minister to this parish in March 1985. Before that he worked in a church in Zimbabwe. The children like him very much as he is young and is good fun. He has two young children of his own so he is used to children. He tells us very nice stories at the church service. We have a weekly assembly on Thursday morning in school and Mr. Burt leads the service. He uses a flannelgraph to show us pictures when he tells us a story from the bible. At present he is telling us the story about Elijah. After the story we sing hymns. Many children go to Sunday school .
